data.title: Moving Interstate Newcastle Removalists
data.meta_description: Moving interstate to Newcastle? With 75+ years experience, Kent Removals & Storage is Australia's #1 Interstate Newcastle Removalist. Call 1300 697 150 now!
data.text:
Kent's expert interstate removalists Newcastle will seamlessly handle your interstate move door-to-door with ease, for a stress-free move anywhere in Australia.

Whether you're moving from Newcastle to Sydney, or regional Victoria to the Gold Coast, our exceptional interstate removals services ensure that when moving across Australia, your treasures are delivered safely, securely and on-time, every time. Kent boasts a comprehensive network of service locations across Australia, as well as country-wide expertise in moving, shipping and logistics. Our friendly Newcastle removalists can expertly deliver your treasures literally anywhere on this continent.

With more than 60,000 Australians, (including many thousands from Newcastle), trusting Kent with their move every year, and countless customer service excellence awards, our superior range of interstate removalist services feature:

Extensive interstate removals experience, from having moved Melbournians across Australia for over 70 years

Coast to coast delivery locations, allowing us to expertly deliver your treasures literally anywhere on this continent

Expert country-wide knowledge and experience in moving, shipping and logistics, so you can move with a company that truly knows Australia

Attentive, caring customer service to assist specific moving needs

Highly trained, industry leading professional packers and removalists who will handle your treasures with the utmost care

Our Guardian Packing System (including custom designed moving boxes, protective packing material and advanced processes) to help safeguard all your treasures.

Why Choose Kent's Newcastle Interstate Removalists

For moving peace of mind, choose Kent to ensure that:

Your treasures will be moved with care

At Kent Newcastle, we care about your interstate move, and take pride in delivering exceptional customer service, including:

Attentive, caring service from friendly, removalist experts

Highly-trained professional packers and removalists

Timely responses to any questions you might have

Consistent, superior worldwide customer service, regardless of whether you are moving locally, moving interstate or moving overseas.

Your treasures will be moved with trust

With our 70 year history as a removals industry leader, you can trust us to move your treasures because we have:

Successfully moved over a million people across Australia and the world

Superior moving processes and systems that ensure a stress-free move

Custom designed moving boxes, packing materials and containers to help guard your treasures against breakage, vermin, dust and the elements

World-class secure storage solutions, including the most advanced undercover storage facilities in the southern hemisphere to help keep your treasures safe

Received countless awards and client accolades for our exceptional customer service.

Your treasures will be moved stress-free

We take the stress out of moving interstate by delivering a comprehensive range of end-to-end moving services and products, including:

Seamless door-to-door packing, removalist and valet unpacking services to save you time and let you get on with organising the rest of your move

Custom designed moving boxes, packing materials and containers to protect your treasures from breakage, vermin, dust and the elements

Carefully planned pet transport and boarding to ensure that your pet's interstate move is as stress-free as your own

Safe and trackable car relocation so you can focus on getting you and your family to your new home, without having to worry about your car, boat or motorcycle

Ancillary services, like trades contracting and set up of your home office to save you time, so you can focus on settling into your new home

Comprehensive moving and storage insurance options for that ultimate layer of security and peace of mind.

Your treasures will be moved safely

From fine china to priceless heirlooms, our industry leading crews and processes help ensure that your treasures will be moved safely, by providing:

Professional packers and removalists who are expertly trained

Kent's Guardian Wrapping System with heavy-duty plastic wrap and cartons exactly designed for specific items

Custom crating and precious item packing for high value goods

Custom-built reinforced steel containers to safely secure your treasures while in transit and storage

Purpose-built state-of-the-art storage facilities that are safe from dust, pests and the elements, and fire and security monitored 24/7

Storage and transit insurance to cover your treasures for that ultimate layer of security and peace of mind.

Your treasures will be moved affordably

At Kent Newcastle, we pride ourselves on consistently delivering premium moving and storage services at affordable rates. We work with you to meet your needs within your budget, and we're confident that if you compare our high quality services to others' you'll find our value to be excellent.

Your treasures will be stored securely

At Kent Newcastle, we ensure superior protection for your treasures with our secure storage solutions, including:

Our unique four-level security protection solution provides complete peace of mind that your treasures are protected by exceptional security

Custom-built reinforced steel containers to protect your treasures against vermin, dust, mould and mildew

State-of-the-art storage facilities to ensure the utmost protection for your belongings in element-proof 24/7 monitored warehouses

Your treasures professionally packed directly into our containers to minimise handling and ensure maximum protection

Our storage and transit insurance covers your treasures for absolute peace of mind.

Our Newcastle Interstate Removal Services

Moving Interstate

Our expert interstate removals services ensure that when moving across Australia your treasures are delivered safely, securely and on-time, every time. Our Newcastle interstate removals services include:

Extensive interstate removals experience, from having moved Melbournians across Australia for over 70 years

Coast to coast delivery locations, allowing us to expertly deliver your treasures literally anywhere on this continent

Expert country-wide knowledge and experience in moving, shipping and logistics, so you can move with a company that truly knows Australia

Attentive, caring customer service to assist specific moving needs

Highly trained, industry leading professional packers and removalists who will handle your treasures with the utmost care

Our Guardian Packing System (including custom designed moving boxes, protective packing material and advanced processes) to help safeguard all your treasures.

Secure Storage

At Kent Newcastle, we ensure superior protection for your treasures with our secure storage solutions, including:

Our unique four-level security protection solution which provides complete peace of mind that your treasures are protected by the exceptional levels of security

Custom-built reinforced steel containers to protect your treasures against vermin, dust, mould and mildew

State-of-the-art storage facilities to ensure the utmost protection for your belongings in element-proof 24/7 monitored warehouses

Minimal handling of your treasures to ensure maximum protection

Our storage and transit insurance covers your treasures for absolute peace of mind.

More about Secure Storage

Insurance

Even with Kent's enviable service record and 70 years of removals expertise, unavoidable accidents can still happen. Our storage and transit insurance assures you absolute peace of mind. You can choose removals insurance with full, restricted and additional coverage for:

Owner packed goods

Pairs and sets

Mechanical and electrical derangement

Mould and mildew

Packing and shipping costs.

More about Insurance

Packing

From fine china to priceless heirlooms, we have perfected our packing techniques and materials to help keep all your treasures safe and secure, including:

Expertly trained, industry-leading professional packers and removalists who will handle your treasures with the utmost respect

The world's most advanced range of moving boxes and packing materials, with an extensive range of cartons specifically designed to protect each of your treasures

Kent's Guardian Wrapping System with heavy-duty plastic wrap and packing processes to help safeguard even your most fragile belongings in transit

Custom-built crates and precious item packing for high value goods

Purpose-built containers, constructed from reinforced steel, to safely secure your treasures while in transit and storage.

More about Packing

Moving Boxes

Kent's Guardian Packing System uses the world's most advanced custom-designed protective moving boxes to help keep all your belongings safe. Our extensive range of moving boxes includes:

Treasure Pak …for crystal, china, ornaments and other fragile items

Multi Pak …for protecting just about any household item

LCD-Plasma Pak …for your valuable flat-screen TV

Flexi Art Pak …for large paintings and hanging mirrors

Readers Pak …for heavy collections of books

International Travel Pak …for storing your wardrobe safely and efficiently

Electronics Pak …for your audio equipment and other devices

Fashion Pak …for keeping your best clothes wrinkle-free

TV and Computer Pak …for protecting your indispensable hardware

Bottle Pak …for transporting prized bottles of wine and spirits

Bits and Pieces Pak …for all those little odds and ends

Shade Pak …for protecting lampshades against rattling and crushing.

More about Moving Boxes

Valet Services

From cleaning and unpacking to organising and styling rooms, our expert valet team can help you effortlessly and quickly set up and settle into your new home. Our comprehensive range of valet services includes:

Cleaning, unpacking and organising your kitchen, bathrooms, cupboards and closets

Unpacking clothes into drawers, cupboards and wardrobes

Setting up bedrooms and making up beds

Furnishing living areas with appliances, books, ornaments and paintings

Arranging and setting up your working area or home office

Preparing empty packing materials for collection.

More about Valet Services

Car Transport

Whether you need to move a car, motorbike, trailer or boat, we have the team and the expertise to safely and securely transport your vehicle locally, interstate or overseas. Choose Kent Newcastle's car transport services because:

We have 70 years of experience safely and securely transporting cars and all types of vehicles interstate and internationally

We professionally handle the entire process from door-to-door

All necessary paperwork and logistics are included as part of the service

We can deliver to any address within Victoria, Australia or overseas.

More about Car Transport

Pet Transport and Boarding

We know that your pet needs a safe, stress-free relocation as much as you do. You can be assured from our pet transport and boarding services that:

Your pet will be transported door-to-door in air conditioned comfort

Your pet will receive careful attention along the way, including any dietary requirements, medicines, vet visits and boarding needed

We will communicate with you throughout the journey to save you from worry

If you are moving overseas, our services can extend to vaccination, shipping, documentation and quarantine requirements.

More about Pet Transport and Boarding

Ancillary Services

We believe that it's the small things that turn a good move into a great move. Kent Newcastle offers a comprehensive range of ancillary services to take care of all the small things and give you more time to settle into your new home, including:

House cleaning

Valet services

Utility disconnection/connection

Computer and network disconnection/connection

Home theatre disconnection/connection

Handyman services, odd jobs and trade contracting.

More about Ancillary Services

Read more Kent Removals reviews

Newcastle, NSW and Other General Moving & Storage Information

Newcastle, New South Wales has a population of 308,308. The Newcastle postcode is 2300 and surrounded by suburbs: Newcastle West, Hamilton and Mayfield.

The median property house price in Newcastle is $747,500. The distance from Newcastle to the closest Kent Storage facility in Newcastle is approximately 23.8 km.

Newcastle is well serviced by public transport and lifestyle amenities. There are several local schools, various shopping precincts and the area enjoys a selection of healthcare providers.
